name: UNO Online Card Game | Construct 3
description:
Shepherd Games offers you UNO, a nice online multiplayer card game with AI support.

Features

  • Three game modes
    • Two Player
    • Three Player
    • Four Player
  • AI implementation
  • Online Multiplayer
    • Need atleast two players available online
  • Free upgrades
  • Try the demo before you download it
  • Easily to implement
  • No Shepherd Games' splash screen

Source code folder contains 

  • Construct 3 project file
  • HTML export with no Shepherd Games' splash screen
  • Guidelines with screenshots

For any support, you may reach out to us at our Discord channel or write to contact@shepherd.games

Download Source Codes | Premium Assets 

Asset Pack by AlexDer
